'''0.0.19a_02''' is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on June 19, 2009, between 23:40 to 23:51 UTC.<ref name="update">[[#0619 logs|June 19 IRC logs]]: "''P6:40:29 <Gamerkough> New minecraft update is borked.''", "''P6:40:32 <wingboy> glass is updated''" [...] "''P6:42:47 <MANIA> wait, another update for sure?''" [...] "''P6:43:44 <MANIA> glass has been updated again?''" [...] "''P6:44:06 <Evil-Ville> Looks less like ice now''" [...] "''P6:46:09 <Evil-Ville> The new glass is better because it allows you to see through it properly''" [...] "''P7:39:33 <Senku> This glass texture still seems like it has too many lines on it''" [...] "''P7:39:45 <Notch> I'm very happy with how the glass texture ended up''" (23:40 to 24:39 UTC)</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Glass JE3 BE1.png|32px]] [[Glass]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Glass_JE2.png|32px]].<ref name="update"/><ref>[[#0622 logs|June 22 IRC logs]]: ''P1:17:31 <Haruhi2> the version that was semi-opaque looked more like ice than glass [...] then the version after that was fine [...] then he changed it a bit and now it doesn't really look like either''</ref>

== Bugs ==
'''2 bugs reported'''
* Players are sometimes unable to break blocks.<ref>[[#0619 logs|June 19 IRC logs]]: "''P6:40:43 <Gamerkough> Anybody else not able to delete blocks?''", "''P6:40:54 <Snowman> I am''", "''P6:40:59 <Snowman> able to do it'''" (23:40 UTC)</ref>
* [[Water]] texture now has lines in it due to z-fighting.<ref>[[#6/19 logs|June 19 IRC logs]]: "''P6:44:07 <LKA> water has lines between each tile, now?''" [...] "''P6:45:06 <LKA> water has lines between the textures now so''" [...] "''P6:46:12 <vdgmprgrmr> Whoa, I'm seeing blue lines in the water now...''" [...] "''P6:47:14 <vdgmprgrmr> If you go to the edge of a cliff with water at the bottom, and look straight down, you'll see lines.''" [...] "''P9:03:54 <Redshift> notch, are you going to fix the lines that appear along the water texture?''" (June 19, 2009, 23:45 UTC, to June 20, 2009, 02:03 UTC)</ref>
